DOC.brief_summary: The objective study assess compare bilateral uncorrected distance visual acuity distance spectacle independence post bilateral implantation AcrySof Toric Intraocular Lenses ( IOLs ) monofocal IOLs . Secondary outcome include cost eyeglass purchase patient vision-related quality life .
DOC.brief_title: Visual Outcomes After Bilateral Surgical Cataract Phacoemulsification : AcrySof Toric IOL Implantation Compared Monofocal IOL Implantation
DOC.criteria: willing able understand sign inform consent ; willing able attend postoperative examination per protocol schedule ; ≥ 21 year age , either gender race ; bilateral , age relate , cataract ; plan cataract removal via phacoemulsification implantation intraocular lens ( IOL ) ; available undergo second eye surgery within 6 week first eye surgery ; good ocular health , exception cataract ; free disease ( ) /condition ( ) list `` Precautions '' section AcrySof Toric monofocal package insert : choroidal hemorrhage , chronic severe uveitis , concomitant severe eye disease , extremely shallow anterior chamber , medically uncontrolled glaucoma , microphthalmos , nonagerelated cataract , proliferative diabetic retinopathy ( severe ) , severe corneal dystrophy , severe optic nerve atrophy , irregular corneal astigmatism color vision deficiency . regular corneal astigmatism ; qualify bilateral AcrySof Toric IOLs AcrySof Toric Calculator ( www.acrysoftoriccalculator.com ) able obtain pupil dilation ≥ 5.0 mm able read understand one follow language : Dutch , French , German previous corneal surgery and/or reshape abnormality , disease and/or condition cornea ( i.e . keratoconus , corneal dystrophy , keratitis , corneal scar , etc . ) , would clinically contraindicate implantation toric intraocular lens plan multiple procedure cataract/IOL implantation surgery plan limbal relaxing incision ( LRI ) , Excimer laser treatment similar procedure prior course study ocular disease and/or condition may compromise visual acuity level ( i.e . glaucoma , diabetic retinopathy , amblyopia , etc . ) pregnant , lactate plan pregnancy course study . Subjects become pregnant study discontinue ; however , data may exclude effectiveness analysis pregnancy alter refraction visual acuity result . Data collect CRF observation .
